workflow.name: Generate personalized weather reports with OpenWeatherMap, Python and GPT-4.1-mini
workflow.description:
## How it works
- User enters name of a city for which most current weather information will be gathered
- Custom Python code processes the weather data and generates a custom email about the weather
- AI agent further customizes the email and add a related joke about the weather
- Recipient gets the custom email for the city

## Set up instructions
- Enter city to get the weather data
- Add OpenWeather API and replace <your_API_key> with your actual API key
- Add your OpenAI API in OpenAI Chat Model Node
- Add your Gmail credentials and specify a recipient for the custom email

workflow.name: Custom Weather Email using Python and AI

parameters.pythonCode:
# Get the processed weather data weather_data = items[0]['json'] # Create HTML email content html_content = f""" Weather Report

{weather_data['weather_emoji']} Weather Report

{weather_data['location']}
{weather_data['timestamp']}
{weather_data['current_conditions']['temperature_celsius']}¬∞C
Feels like {weather_data['current_conditions']['feels_like_celsius']}¬∞C
{weather_data['current_conditions']['description']}
{weather_data['analysis']['comfort_level']}

üìä Current Conditions

{weather_data['current_conditions']['humidity']}%
Humidity
{weather_data['current_conditions']['pressure']}
Pressure (hPa)
{weather_data['current_conditions']['wind_speed_kmh']}
Wind (km/h)
{weather_data['current_conditions']['visibility_km']}
Visibility (km)

üéØ Recommendations

üëï What to Wear:
{weather_data['analysis']['clothing_suggestion']}
üèÉ Activities:
{weather_data['analysis']['activity_recommendation']}

‚≠ê Weather Quality Score

{int(weather_data['analysis']['weather_quality_score'])}
Out of 100
ü§ñ Generated by n8n Weather Pipeline
Powered by Python ‚Ä¢ OpenWeatherMap API
Stay informed, stay prepared!
""" # Create plain text version text_content = f""" üå§Ô∏è DAILY WEATHER REPORT üìç Location: {weather_data['location']} üïí Time: {weather_data['timestamp']} üå°Ô∏è CURRENT CONDITIONS - Temperature: {weather_data['current_conditions']['temperature_celsius']}¬∞C ({weather_data['current_conditions']['temperature_fahrenheit']}¬∞F) - Feels Like: {weather_data['current_conditions']['feels_like_celsius']}¬∞C ({weather_data['current_conditions']['feels_like_fahrenheit']}¬∞F) - Condition: {weather_data['current_conditions']['description']} - Humidity: {weather_data['current_conditions']['humidity']}% - Wind Speed: {weather_data['current_conditions']['wind_speed_kmh']} km/h - Pressure: {weather_data['current_conditions']['pressure']} hPa - Visibility: {weather_data['current_conditions']['visibility_km']} km üí° ANALYSIS - Comfort Level: {weather_data['analysis']['comfort_level']} - Weather Quality Score: {int(weather_data['analysis']['weather_quality_score'])}/100 üëï CLOTHING RECOMMENDATION {weather_data['analysis']['clothing_suggestion']} üèÉ ACTIVITY RECOMMENDATION {weather_data['analysis']['activity_recommendation']} --- Generated by n8n Weather Pipeline Powered by Python & OpenWeatherMap API """ # Return the email content return [{ "json": { "subject": f"{weather_data['weather_emoji']} Weather Report - {weather_data['location']} ({weather_data['current_conditions']['temperature_celsius']}¬∞C)", "html_content": html_content, "text_content": text_content, "weather_data": weather_data } }]

parameters.text:
=You are an email drafting expert. Take the weather information from {{ $json.text_content }} and make it pretty and easy to read. Use proper spacing, use of paragraphs and bullet points.

Prepare your email in html format.

Add a joke relevant to the weather if possible.

parameters.content: Enter the name of a city in the form

Add OpenWeather API key to get current weather information about the cit, replace <your_API_key> with your actual API key. 
Python script will process and generate custom email relating to the weather.
Add OpenAI API Key. AI Agent will add a custom joke about the weather for the city you entered as part of the email message
Add your Gmail credentials and update header and body of message. Node will send the custom email to the recipient
